thread.title: 10 Heels That Will Never Hurt Your Feet Or Feelings
thread.title_full: 10 Heels That Will Never Hurt Your Feet Or Feelings

title: 10 Heels That Will Never Hurt Your Feet Or Feelings
text: facebook 105 SHARES If you have ever walked bare feet, because walking in those 5 inch heels is like walking on fire, or if you have ever skipped the ‘elevated shoe’ section and moved to the other corner of the store, or if you own tons of flats and a few pair of heels (still sitting inside the boxes), or if you have always regretted choosing heels over shoes, or (drum roll) if you rejoiced and celebrated the ‘white sneaker’ culture more than anybody else because, sneakers - you’ve come to the right place! For the longest time, heels have been a bittersweet experience, always tilting more towards the bitter side. What if we told you that you too can wear heels without making your feet cry! Yes, you read that right. Thanks to science, technology, and mostly changing design sensibilities, there are bunch of heels that can be worn by anyone who has dreaded their daunting demeanour all their lives. We made a list of ten pair of heels that can be your new BFFs. Get ready to strut a few inches higher! 1. These floral beauties.
